meanings.definition: A person or company that makes goods for sale.
meanings.sent1: The manufacturer produced high-quality toys for children.
meanings.sent2: The manufacturer shipped out a new batch of smartphones to stores.
meanings.sent3: The manufacturer decided to make a line of shoes for elephants.
meanings.sent4: The small bakery was a manufacturer of delicious pastries.
meanings.sent5: The manufacturer's factory hummed with activity as workers assembled products.

meanings.definition: To make (something) on a large scale using machinery.
meanings.sent1: The company will manufacturer a new line of cars next year.
meanings.sent2: They manufacturered thousands of bottles of soda in a day.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that he could manufacturer a mountain of pancakes in an hour.
meanings.sent4: She could manufacturer beautiful music with just a few simple tools.
meanings.sent5: The factory workers manufacturered the parts with precision and care.
